newsitem.title: GERMANY: Futures downtrend reduces Bremen coffee prices.
newsitem.headline: Futures downtrend reduces Bremen coffee prices.

text.p: Price falls in Bremen arabicas by $12-20 on the week per 50 kg fob reflected lower futures in New York ahead of expected stocks additions as well as a bear trend in robustas, traders said on Friday.
Cash markets saw some buying interest in distant months.
Brazilian prices were most competitive while Central American levels eased in the direction of cheaper Colombians.
Kenyan fly crop prices weakened because the qualities were not as high as buyers had anticipated while Papuan supplies were emerging as an alternative.
Robustas eased but buyers sought even lower prices.
